definitions.definition: An expert in virtù or art objects and antiquities; a connoisseur .
Someone with special skill or knowledge ; an expert .
Specifically, a musician (or other performer) with masterly ability , technique , or personal style .

main_definition: ( now historical ) An expert in virtù or art objects and antiquities; a connoisseur . [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: Someone with special skill or knowledge ; an expert . [from 17th c.]
Specifically, a musician (or other performer) with masterly ability , technique , or personal style . [from 18th c.]
